page.title: 20THANKS TO...................
page.content: Most of the information on this survey was collected by third form pupils of Prince Henry's Grammar School, Otley. The work was carried out during the summer term, 1985, by classes 3W, 3L and 3E, under the supervision of Mr. Hattersley and Mrs. Brighouse. Special help was given by Mary Leefe, Nicola Helliwell and Kirsty Lord in entering the text pages when the classes ran out of lesson time! Information was also gathered by pupils of Ashfield First School, Otley, under the direction of Mrs. Wilson, and this was incorporated in the main text and survey.
